title: To Sway the Unvaccinated, New Tactics Are Tried at Funeral Homes and on Radio Shows
sub_head: Trusted local voices are deployed as broad public health campaign transitions to a more personalized approach in states including Missouri and Oregon
body:
Kansas family doctor Jennifer McKenney has tried three times in recent months to persuade her longtime patient, McCager Thompson, to get a Covid-19 vaccine.
First he said no, then maybe, then this past week he was back to no.
